alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 20 at 3:50AM PDT until March 21 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
